description: API to query, access and aggregate geospatial variables from the Space2Stats database. Demographic, socio-economic and environmental variables are available at the global level through a global hexagonal grid (h3 level 6). The purpose of this API is to facilitate the generation of sub-national geospatial aggregates for any administrative boundary set.
Responsible Party:
Ben Stewart (TTL)
World Bank, Development Data Group (DECDG)
Purpose: The purpose of this API is to facilitate the generation of sub-national geospatial aggregates for any administrative boundary set.
title: Space2Stats Database
